member.name: T:ContentProvider.ContentSet
member.summary: Represents a named set of contents, consisting of a primary content source and zero or more fallback sources.

member.name: M:ContentProvider.ContentSet.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified .
member.param: The name of the content set.

member.name: P:ContentProvider.ContentSet.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the content set.

member.name: M:ContentProvider.ContentSet.GetAsStringAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a content entry as a string value, given its .
member.param: The name of the content entry.
member.returns: The string value of the content entry.
member.exception: Thrown if the content entry is not found in this content set.

member.name: M:ContentProvider.ContentSet.GetAsBinaryAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a content entry as a binary value (byte[]), given its .
member.param: The name of the content entry.
member.returns: The byte[] value of the content entry.
member.exception: Thrown if the content entry is not found in this content set.

member.name: P:ContentProvider.ContentSet.Sources
member.summary: Gets the list of content sources registered with this content set.

member.name: M:ContentProvider.ContentSource.TryLoadAsStringAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Attempts to load an item from the content source as a string, given its .
member.param: The name of the content item to retrieve.
member.returns: A tuple indicating whether the content item could be loaded, and if so, the string content itself.

member.name: M:ContentProvider.ContentSource.TryLoadAsBinaryAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Attempts to load an item from the content source as a byte array, given its .
member.param: The name of the content item to retrieve.
member.returns: A tuple indicating whether the content item could be loaded, and if so, the byte array content itself.

member.name: T:ContentProvider.ContentSource`1
member.summary:
Represents a source from which to retrieve content.
Examples include assembly embedded resources, files, web sites, etc.

member.name: T:ContentProvider.ContentSourceOptions
member.summary: Base class for all content source options.

member.name: P:ContentProvider.ContentSourceOptions.NameTransformer
member.summary: Gets or sets an optional delegate that can be used to transform the content entry names generated from the content source.

member.name: P:ContentProvider.EmbeddedResources.EmbeddedResourceContentSourceOptions.FileExtension
member.summary: Gets or sets the file extension to filter embedded resources. If not specified, all embedded resources are considered.

member.name: P:ContentProvider.EmbeddedResources.EmbeddedResourceContentSourceOptions.RootNamespace
member.summary: Gets or sets the namespace to filter embedded resources. If not specified, all embedded resources are considered.

member.name: P:ContentProvider.EmbeddedResources.EmbeddedResourceContentSourceOptions.KeepExtension
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to keep the file extension in the content name.

member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:ContentProvider.Errors.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:ContentProvider.Errors.ContentEntryNotFound
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Could not find content entry {0} under the {1} content..

member.name: P:ContentProvider.Errors.FilesInvalidBaseDirectory
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Specify a valid base directory..

member.name: P:ContentProvider.Errors.FilesMissingBaseDirectory
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The base directory {0} does not exist..

member.name: P:ContentProvider.Errors.InvalidContentSetName
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Specify a valid name for the content set..

member.name: P:ContentProvider.Files.FileContentSourceOptions.SearchPattern
member.summary:
Gets or sets the search string to match against the names of the files. This parameter can contain a combination of valid literal path and wildcard (* and ?) characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions.
The default is *.

member.name: P:ContentProvider.Files.FileContentSourceOptions.SearchOption
member.summary: Gets or sets an enumeration value that specified whether the search operation should include all subdirectories or only the current directory.

member.name: P:ContentProvider.Files.FileContentSourceOptions.KeepExtension
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to keep the file extension in the content name.

member.summary: Registers a for content from files on the file system.
member.param: The base directory to retrieve the files from.
Options for registering the content source.
member.exception: Thrown if the or parameters are null.
